name: Hardcore Racing crazy edition
description:
Hardcore Racing is a game that requires driving skills,
sober thinking, and a good sense of humor.
You will ride through dozens of difficult levels,
created by the bright minds of developers, whose adequacy stands under a big question.
At your disposal machines, like the harsh domestic auto industry,
and classic foreign cars, the keys to which are slyly scattered on maps.
Levels are filled with all sorts of easter eggs, favorite characters of cartoon serials,
memes as well as suffering and pain.
Have you come to a dead end and hope that you will start the level with a checkpoint? Forget)
With every failure, you will have to pass from the beginning,
that will remind you of the game consoles of the 90s.
Playing this masterpiece, you will experience unique feelings of happiness
and unrestrained fun, as well as a feeling of inflammation in the pelvis
and hatred of all living things.
All this is Hardcore Racing.
